title: RADS ERROR.
body: i try to install league of legends with the new client but it installs the old one and then it says i have rads error can anyone help me

replies.body: Most of the time you'll only see those RADS errors when your OS doesn't recognize League as a safe program to run. Double check that you've got all the right [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) setup and you should be able to get the client running again.
